Name: Ice Skating in Pershing Square
Description: Pershing Square Holiday Ice Rink, formerly known as Downtown Ice is one of the most fun and seasonal outdoor ice skating rinks in Dtla

Name: Wrightwood
Description: The town of Wrightwood, California is a small mountain community in Southern California, the area is great for snowsports, hiking and camping.

Name: Bay Islands
Description: The Bay Islands are located in my home country. Honduras' Bay Islands are made up of 3 islands that lie alongside the Mesoamerican Barrier Reef, they're renowned snorkeling and scuba-diving destinations, and the largest island is famed for its beaches and dive site with volcanic crevices.

Name: Macys @ Union Square
Description: The Macys at Union Square, San francisco is the largest on the west coast, with over 7 floors of shopping and numerous restaurants.

Name: Los Angeles Theater
Description: The Los Angeles Theatre is a 2,000-seat historic movie palace in the historic Broadway Theater District in Dtla,there are always interesting events such as Broadway Shows, Musicals, Plays and Concerts
